mapper.insert: insert into f_blog (id, appreciation, commentabled, creattime, flag, published, recommend, title, updatetime, views, typeid, userid, img, explained, content ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appreciation,jdbcType=BIT}, #{commentabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{published,jdbcType=BIT}, #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{views,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{explained,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update f_blog set appreciation = #{appreciation,jdbcType=BIT}, commentabled = #{commentabled,jdbcType=BIT}, creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, published = #{published,jdbcType=BIT}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, views = #{views,jdbcType=INTEGER}, typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, explained = #{explained,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, appreciation, commentabled, creattime, flag, published, recommend, title, updatetime, views, typeid, userid, img, explained, content from f_blog where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
